datatable.name: 城镇村范围面积排名

theme.datatable: select f_xzqhmc as 行政区,sum(COALESCE(mj,0.00)) as 面积 from view_sd_tdlyfl_sld where czcsxmc ='' group by f_xzqhmc order by sum(COALESCE(mj,0.00)) desc

datatable.name: 细化地类

theme.name: 永久基本农田
theme.layer-ref: 全国永久基本农田二级地类{yearfilter};基础底图影像{yearfilter}
theme.layout-ref: Config\DataOverView\chart\chart_layout\专题浏览\土地利用现状\永久基本农田.json

datatable.name: 永久基本农田面积

theme.datatable: select a.hj as "{xzqh}永久基本农田图斑面积",round(a.bm01*100/case when b.bm01 = 0 then 1 else b.bm01 end,2) as "{xzqh}永久基本农田范围内耕地占全部耕地的比例",a.f_xzqhdm,a.f_year from tbhztj_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result a left join tbhztj_sd_yjflhzb_result b on a.f_xzqhdm=b.f_xzqhdm and a.f_year=b.f_year where a.f_year ={yearfilter} and a.f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}'

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按工作分类

theme.datatable: with a as (select hj, bm01,f_xzqhdm,f_year from tbhztj_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '耕地' as 地类,bm01 as 面积,round(bm01/hj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '非耕地' as 地类,(hj - bm01) as 面积,100 - round(bm01/hj*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按工作分类耕地面积

theme.datatable: SELECT 地类,一级地类名,面积,占比 FROM view_sd_yjjbntgzfltjb where f_xzqhdm = '{xzqhfilter}' and f_year ={yearfilter} and 一级地类名 = '{childfilter}'

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按工作分类非耕地面积

theme.datatable: SELECT * FROM view_sd_yjjbntgzfltjb where f_xzqhdm = '{xzqhfilter}' and f_year ={yearfilter} and 一级地类名 = '非耕地'

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按工作分类一级地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm00,bm01,bm02,bm03,bm04,bm05,bm06,bm07,bm08,bm09,bm10,bm11,bm12,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM tbhztj_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') SELECT '湿地' as 地类, bm00 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '耕地' as 地类, bm01 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类, bm02 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类, bm03 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类, bm04 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类, bm05 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, bm06 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, bm07 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类, bm08 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类, bm09 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类, bm10 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类, bm11 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类,bm12 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按工作分类非耕地分类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select bm00,bm02,bm03,bm04,bm05,bm06,bm07,bm08,bm09,bm10,bm11,bm12,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM tbhztj_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') SELECT '湿地' as 地类, bm00 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '种植园用地' as 地类, bm02 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '林地' as 地类, bm03 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '草地' as 地类, bm04 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '商业服务业用地' as 地类, bm05 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '工矿用地' as 地类, bm06 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '住宅用地' as 地类, bm07 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '公共管理与公共服务用地' as 地类, bm08 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '特殊用地' as 地类, bm09 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '交通运输用地' as 地类, bm10 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '水域及水利设施用地' as 地类, bm11 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a union all SELECT '其他土地' as 地类,bm12 as 面积,f_xzqhdm,f_year FROM a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按工作分类详情

theme.datatable: with a as (select 一级地类名,面积,地类 from view_sd_yjjbntgzfltjb where f_xzqhdm = '{xzqhfilter}' and f_year ={yearfilter}) select 一级地类名 as id,'0' as parent,一级地类名 as 地类,sum(面积) as 面积 from a group by 一级地类名 union all select 地类 as id,一级地类名 as parent,地类, 面积 from a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田现状情况统计表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,下级代码,合计,耕地,round(耕地*100/合计,2)::text || '%',水田,水浇地,旱地,合计 - 耕地,(100-round(耕地*100/合计,2))::text || '%',湿地,种植园用地,林地,草地,商业服务业用地,工矿用地,住宅用地,公共管理与公共服务用地,特殊用地, 交通运输用地,水域及水利设施用地,其他土地 from view_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result_sub_{jb} where f_xzqhdm = '{xzqhfilter}' and f_year ={yearfilter} order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按三大类

theme.datatable: with a as (select gdmj,qtnydmj,czcjgkydmj,jtysydmj,qtjsydmj,wlydmj,gdmjbl,qtnydmjbl,czcjgkydmjbl,jtysydmjbl,qtjsydmjbl,wlydmjbl,f_xzqhdm,f_year from tbhztj_sd_fj2_yjjbntnew_result where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '农用地' as 类别,gdmj + qtnydmj as 面积,round((gdmjbl+qtnydmjbl)*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '建设用地' as 类别,czcjgkydmj + jtysydmj + qtjsydmj as 面积,round((czcjgkydmjbl+jtysydmjbl+qtjsydmjbl)*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a union all select '未利用地' as 类别,wlydmj as 面积,round(wlydmjbl*100,2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田土地利用现状按三大类二级地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select 地类,一级地类名,面积 from view_sd_yjjbntsdltjb where f_xzqhdm = '{xzqhfilter}' and f_year ={yearfilter}) select case when 一级地类名 ='未利用地' then '未利用地1' else 一级地类名 end as id,'0' as parent,一级地类名 as 地类,sum(面积) as 面积 from a group by 一级地类名 union all select 地类 as id,case when 一级地类名 ='未利用地' then '未利用地1' else 一级地类名 end as parent,地类, 面积 from a

theme.datatable: with a as (select jkhf0201,jkhf0202,jkhf0203,jkhf0204,jkhf0301,jkhf0302,jkhf0305,jkhf0307,jkhf0403k,jkhf0404,jkhf1104, gchf0201,gchf0202,gchf0203,gchf0204,gchf0301,gchf0302,gchf0305,gchf0307,gchf0403k,gchf0404,gchf1104,f_year,f_xzqhdm from view_sd_yjjbntjkhfgchf_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '即可恢复' as 类型,jkhf0201 as 果园,jkhf0202 as 茶园,jkhf0203 as 橡胶园,jkhf0204 as 其他园地,jkhf0301 as 乔木林地,jkhf0302 as 竹林地,jkhf0305 as 灌木林地,jkhf0307 as 其他林地,jkhf0403k as 可调整人工牧草地,jkhf0404 as 其他草地,jkhf1104 as 坑塘水面 ,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '工程恢复' as 类型,gchf0201 as 果园,gchf0202 as 茶园,gchf0203 as 橡胶园,gchf0204 as 其他园地,gchf0301 as 乔木林地,gchf0302 as 竹林地,gchf0305 as 灌木林地,gchf0307 as 其他林地,gchf0403k as 可调整人工牧草地,gchf0404 as 其他草地,gchf1104 as 坑塘水面 ,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田内各行政区即可恢复与工程恢复种植属性面积
datatable.unit: 公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷,公顷

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,hj,jkhf,jkhf0201,jkhf0201k,jkhf0202,jkhf0202k,jkhf0203,jkhf0203k,jkhf0204,jkhf0204k,jkhf0301,jkhf0301k,jkhf0302,jkhf0302k,jkhf0305,jkhf0307,jkhf0307k,jkhf0403k,jkhf0404,jkhf1104,jkhf1104k, gchf,gchf0201,gchf0201k,gchf0202,gchf0202k,gchf0203,gchf0203k,gchf0204,gchf0204k,gchf0301,gchf0301k,gchf0302,gchf0302k,gchf0305,gchf0307,gchf0307k,gchf0403k,gchf0404,gchf1104,gchf1104k from view_sd_yjjbntjkhfgchf_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 永久基本农田内耕地细化地类面积

theme.datatable: with a as (select hdgd,hqgd,lqgd,mqgd,shgd,smgd,yjgd,f_year,f_xzqhdm from view_sd_yjjbntxhdl_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}') select '河道耕地' as 细化地类,hdgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '湖区耕地' as 细化地类,hqgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '林区耕地' as 细化地类,lqgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '牧区耕地' as 细化地类,mqgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '沙荒耕地' as 细化地类,shgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '石漠化耕地' as 细化地类,smgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a union all select '盐碱耕地' as 细化地类,yjgd as 面积,f_year,f_xzqhdm from a

datatable.name: 永久基本农田内各行政区耕地细化面积

theme.datatable: select 下级名称,hj,hdgd,hdgd0101,hdgd0102,hdgd0103,hqgd,hqgd0101,hqgd0102,hqgd0103,lqgd,lqgd0101,lqgd0102,lqgd0103,mqgd,mqgd0101,mqgd0102,mqgd0103, shgd,shgd0101,shgd0102,shgd0103,smgd,smgd0101,smgd0102,smgd0103,yjgd,yjgd0101,yjgd0102,yjgd0103 from view_sd_yjjbntxhdl_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by 下级代码

datatable.name: 行政区永久基本农田面积

theme.datatable: select 行政区,下级代码,是否耕地,面积,占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year from ( select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'耕地' as 是否耕地,耕地 as 面积,round(耕地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM view_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and 下级代码 <> '{xzqhfilter}' union all select 下级名称 as 行政区,下级代码,'非耕地' as 是否耕地,合计 - 耕地 as 面积,100-round(耕地*100/(case when 合计 =0 then 1 else 合计 end),2) as 占比,f_xzqhdm,f_year,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY 合计 DESC) AS rn FROM view_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm like '' || fn_delxzqhdm_endjbzero('{xzqhfilter}') || '%' and 下级代码 <> '{xzqhfilter}' ) a order by rn,是否耕地

datatable.name: 永久基本农田耕地与非耕地面积比例汇总统计表

theme.datatable: select 下级名称 as 行政区, 合计,耕地 ,round(耕地*100/合计,2) as "耕地占比(%)",合计 - 耕地 as 非耕地,100-round(耕地*100/合计,2) as "非耕地占比(%)" from view_sd_yjjbntxztjb_result_sub_{jb} where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhdm ='{xzqhfilter}' order by f_xzqhdm

datatable.name: 永久基本农田耕地和非耕地详情

theme.datatable: select 地类,一级地类名 as 类型,面积 from view_sd_yjjbntgzfltjb where f_year ={yearfilter} and f_xzqhmc = '{childfilter}'
